name: Visible Pollution
description: Identify visible pollution in the Yamuna River.
why: With this project, we hope to extract data on visible pollution in waters of the 2013 flooding of the Yamuna river.

questionnaire.question: Can you see any water in the photo?
What is the colour of the water?
Can you see rubbish floating in the water?
Can you see piles of dumped household or industrial waste?
Can you see an open sewer (nullah)?
Can you see plastic bags in or near the water?
Can you see pieces of plastic in or near the water?
Can you see dead fish floating in the water?
Can you see any bikes or cycle rickshaws in the water?
Can you see powerlines in or near the water?
Can you see furniture or other household items in or near the water?
